projectDesc.p: The Göttingen Register of Electronic Texts in Indian Languages (GRETIL) is a resource platform providing standardized machine-readable texts in Indian languages that have been contributed by various individuals and institutions.

correction.p: Apparent errors have been silently corrected.

normalization.p: GRETIL normalizes all texts contributed consistently for each language. Sanskrit texts are normalized in accordance with the scheme of the International Alphabet of Sanskrit Transliteration (IAST) in order to facilitate word search across its corpus without additional transformations.

All characters that were fully equivalent to an IAST-conformant character in the text file contributed have been made to conform to the character list below. Non-conformant characters with additional information including accents, capitalization, and whitespace have been preserved as orig elements inside choice elements with their IAST-conformant equivalent in reg elements for the creation of a plain text. These additional informations will be available only in those transformations of this file that display the original information.

div.head: vīṇāśikhatantra

lg.l: teṣāṃ madhye samutthāya devī vacanam abravīt //
uttaraṃ hṛdayaṃ hy eṣāṃ bhaktāya dātum arhasi //
subhaktasya vinītasya gopitaṃ vai guhasya ca //
tenaiva varadā devyo nityaṃ devi bhavanti hi //
vratahomād ṛte cāsmin susiddhiṃ labhate param //
nānyathā darśayet tantraṃ na cāsau siddhim āpnuyāt //
ālabhyaiva tu sāvitryā kṣālayet sakalaṃ kramāt //
rakṣāṃ sadā śatair bījaiḥ kṛtvā dhyātvā ca tāḥ kramāt //
ādau deśe same bhūmau vivikte śalyavarjite //
tatra madhye likhet padmaṃ catuḥpattraṃ sakarṇikam //
tataḥ sitāṃ svabījena jayāṃ prāgdale vinyaset //
vinyasya pūjāṃ kurvīta svaiḥ svair bījair yathākramam //
evaṃ yaṣṭvā yathānyāyaṃ śiṣyān āprokṣya vāriṇā //
svaiḥ svair bījair nyaset puṣpān śiṣyāṇāṃ karayor dvayoḥ //
praveśya tatra śiṣyaṃ tu dvitricatuḥpañca eva vā //
vahnim ādāya tenaiva sāvitryā pūjayet tataḥ //
svabījair eva tad dhutvā dīkṣāṃ śiṣyasya kārayet //
abhiṣicya svabījais tu bījān tebhyaḥ pradāpayet //
devyaḥ prītā bhavanty eva avaśiṣṭaṃ jale kṣipet //
praṇāmaiḥ śaktidānaiś ca yena vā tuṣyate guruḥ //
susame bhūmideśe tu prastāraṃ prastarec chuciḥ //
kuryād ekonapañcāśat koṣṭhakān tu samān śubhān //

lg.note: em. Sanderson: kālavahnyanilair bījaiḥ kalayā ṣaṣṭhayā yutam

lg.l: kūṭasthās tu smṛtā bījāḥ pañca caiva varānane //
prāṇāyāmais tribhir devi ātmānaṃ tu viśodhayet //
dagdhvā tu prākṛtaṃdehaṃ bhasmakūṭam iva sthitam //
sravantaṃ mūrdhni paramaṃ praṇavaṃ ca adhomukham //
dehaṃ saṃśodhayen mantrī ghorapāpaṃ tu kalmaṣam //
hastau saṃśodhayet paścād vidhir eṣa prakīrtitaḥ //
aṭguṣṭhād ye tu ye parvā karayor ubhayor api //
śivatattvaṃ nyasen mūrdhni haste dehe punaḥ kramāt //
etad ālabhanaṃ caiva tava devi prakīrtitam //
vāme trīṇi samākramya aṭguṣṭhau ca susaṃsthitau //
kaṭyūrdhve ca tataś cānyaṃ caturthaṃ jānutaḥ kaṭim //
evaṃ bījena dehas tu mucyate nātra saṃśayaḥ //
mucyate ca sadā rogair mṛtyurūpair durāsadaiḥ //
mucyate nātra saṃdeho yo 'pi syāt pātakī naraḥ //
pūrvavad dhastamātraṃ tu likhitvā maṇḍalaṃ śubham //
muktidā siddhidā hy evaṃ bhavantīty avicāraṇāt //
darśayed yonimudrāṃ tu kāle karmāṇi kārayet //
yathā tu abhyāsamātreṇa siddhir bhavati kāmadā //
praṇayasva prasādaś ca yadi cāsti maheśvara //
praṇayād atulaṃ vāpi rahasyaṃ paramaṃ padam //
atrāntaram idaṃ jñānaṃ śrutvā bhavati nirvṛtiḥ //
tad eva vijayākhyātā kiṃ tu yuktaṃ na kena cit //
guhyam etat samuddiṣṭaṃ praṣṭavyaṃ nānyataḥ param //
prayogaṃ cāsya vakṣyāmi siddhir yenāśu jāyate //
sarvatra sulabhaṃ śāstraṃ prayogaṃ tu sudurlabham //
gatiṃ devaṃ tu vijñāya tataḥ karma samārabhet //
dehasthaṃ tu kathaṃ vidyād vaktum arhasi śaṅkara //
tasyā madhye sthito devaḥ sa tu dīpaśikhopamaḥ //
tad atra japamātreṇa mantrī sādhayate kṣaṇāt //
puruṣasya tathā proktaṃ dakṣiṇāṅge tu kārayet //
saptāhān nāśayed indraṃ kiṃ punar mānuṣādikam //
trisandhyaṃ dhārayed rātrau agnikāryaṃ tu kārayet //
homānte tu dhyāyet sādhyaṃ vihvalaṃ ca sammūrchitam //
rājānaṃ rājapatnīṃ vā saptāhād vaśam ānayet //
yaṃ yaṃ spṛśati hastena dāsatvam upagacchati //
yaṃ spṛśed darśayed yaṃ tu vidviṣṭāḥ suhṛdāny api //
nikhanyate sa vai kṣipraṃ prayāti yamasādanam //
bījair etaiḥ samāyuktair ālikhya prakṣiped budhaḥ //
mumukṣor api tasyāstraṃ śāntipuṣṭiś ca jāyate //
kṣīrāktena tu deveśi rogī rogād vimucyate //
kurvanto 'pi vyayaṃ nityam akṣayatvaṃ ca gacchati //
tejasvī balasampanno nāpy asau pīḍyate bhayaiḥ //
sarvakāmas tilaṃ juhyāt prāpnuyāt tu na saṃśayaḥ //
yāvad uttiṣthate pretaḥ kiṃ karomīti so 'bravīt //
guḍikāñjanapādukaṃ khanyaṃ vā rājyam eva ca //
abhimantrya imair bījair anulomaiḥ śatena tu //
yasyā dadāti tadvad āste striyāyāḥ sādhakottamaḥ //
juhuyāt saptarātraṃ tu yasya nāmnā tu sādhakaḥ //
nyastavyaṃ tu yad ādau tu ? sādhye vai bījapañcakam //
yathā saṃharate śakraṃ tatprayogam idaṃ śṛṇu //
devīnāṃ ca tatas tena sādhyam āvṛtya yogavit //
dṛṣtvā taṃ manasā bhūyo mūrcchitaṃ bhuvi vihvalam //
tatas tvadhomukhaṃ sthāpya pīḍitaṃ chardayed asṛk //
sādhyaḥ prayāti nidhanaṃ mṛtyur āntima ? kampayet //
yathā saṃharate śakraṃ baddhe ruddhe 'tha mokṣaṇāt //
varṇāntayāgam ekānte sadā gopitaṃ tan mayā //
sugandhaiś ca vicitraiś ca likhec ca susamāhitaḥ //
tataḥ siddhim avāpnoti brahmaghno 'pi hi nānyathā //
ataḥ paraṃ pravakṣyāmi japasya vidhim uttamam //
uccātane kākapakṣaṃ vaśye jātiṃ tu homayet //
yena kālaṃ ca vai jñātaṃ tena jñātaḥ sadāśivaḥ //
tasmāt kriyāṃ ca kālaṃ ca asaṃjñeyaṃ prayatnataḥ //
kālahīnānṛtaṃ manye sarvam eva ca śaṅkara //
yaj jñātvā tu sukhenaiva siddhir bhavati mantriṇām //
tathā haṃsaṃ pravakṣyāmi sādhakānāṃ hitāya vai //
śabdaḥ sparśaś ca rūpaṃ ca raso gandhas tathaiva ca //
ādhāraṃ puram ity uktaṃ puruṣaś cādheya ucyate //
tadvac charīraṃ devasya sarvabījagaṇaṃ hi yat //
suṣumnāyāṃ yadā deva upaśānto vahaty asau //
nāḍīsaṃsthaṃ yathā karma kurute mantriṇaḥ sadā //
iḍā ca piṅgalā caiva nāḍyau dve samudāhṛte //
jñātvā kālaṃ ca tattvaṃ tu tataḥ karma samārabhet //
svaraktaṃ gocanaṃ caiva tathā sindūram eva ca //
kucayugme ca devīnām agrato nikhaneta tu //
bhage vā athavā liṅge sanmantrāṇy aṣṭaśatāni tu //
saptāhād ānayed vaśyaṃ striyaṃ vā puruṣam api vā //
kṣīravṛkṣaṃ bhage likhya liṅgaṃ vā kīlayet tataḥ //
uddhṛtena bhaven mokṣaṃ nātra kāryā vicāraṇā //
vicareta mahīṃ kṛtsnāṃ nātra kāryā vicāraṇā //
anenaiva mṛdā meṣaṃ kārayen mantravit sadā //
devīnām agrataḥ sthāpya tasya nāsāṃ pracālayet //
ete yogavarā devi mayā tava udāhṛtāḥ //
unmaneṣv atha ghoreṣu sākāreṇa tu sādhayet //
śarīre vinyased devi pūrvam uktakrameṇa tu //
yoniṃ baddhvā tataḥ paścāt sādhakaḥ susamāhitaḥ //
kuryāt sarvāṇi kāryāṇi tataḥ siddhir na saṃśayaḥ //
varam iṣtaṃ prayacchanti trayātītaṃ padaṃ hi yat //
bījāni bījayet prājñaḥ tataḥ karma samārabhet //
nātaḥ parataro mantras triṣu lokeṣu vidyate //
tvayāpi caivam evaṃ hi rakṣaṇīyaṃ prayatnataḥ //
sidhyate nātra saṃdehaḥ sarvakāmas tu mantriṇām //
vaśyākarṣas tathā nāśaṃ sarvaṃ sidhyati sādhake //
nirmathya kathito devi dadhno ghṛtam ivoddhṛtam //
tasya deyam idaṃ tantraṃ na ca nāstikanindake //
tantraṃ vīṇāśikhaṃ nāma durlabhaṃ tridaśeṣv api //
tapasā durdharāllabdhaṃ yac ca jñānaṃ śivodbhavam //
prasādaṃ kuru deveśa kaḥ parampārate mama //
tantraṃ naivādhigacchanti na caiva bahudhā śrutam //
yan mayā kathitaṃ pūrvaṃ tad gṛhāṇa subhāṣitam //
vāram ekaṃ kuru vyaktaṃ prasādaṃ sūkṣmagocaram //
nāyāso na vrataś caiva na tapaś ca maheśvari //
śikhāyāṃ saṃsthito devo bindudevī jayā smṛtā //
saptaviṃśa śiraḥ proktaṃ triṃśamas tu śikhā bhavet //
savisarganayapadaṃ bījāntasthaṃ(?) ū ī siddhikarī nṛṇām(?) //
uccāte dhūmravarṇaṃ tu śvetaṃ caiva puṣṭyarthinā //
nityaṃ sā sevyate yuktair yogibhir niṣkalā parā //
tatra madhye gataṃ paśyed devyā guhyottarambhavā //
evaṃ varṇavibhāgaṃ tu jñātvā siddhim avāpnuyāt //
yajanaṃ yājanaṃ caiva saṃyogaṃ ca layaṃ tathā //
etaj jñātvā tu mantrajñaḥ śivasāyujyatāṃ vrajet //
śivībhūtas tu mantro vai sādhayed akhilaṃ jagat //
nirdahate mantraṃ devi yadā karma na kurvati //
śivīkurvīta bindusthaṃ mantrī mantraṃ tu yogavit //
dīpanaṃ śaktinā nityaṃ japen mantrī samāhitaḥ //
vaśam ānayate kṣipraṃ viśvaṃ manata ? saṃśayaḥ //
vidhir atra krame cāyaṃ paścād vakṣye jape vidhim //
avicchinnaṃ drutaṃ caiva avilambitam eva ca //
alabhya mama mantraṃ syād drutaṃ kālasya sidhyati //
tṛtīyā caiva māhendrī vāruṇī tu tathāpare //
bījapiṇḍaṃ tu madhyasthaṃ mudrāyuktaṃ sadā yajet //
sādhayen manasā dhyātvā kāmārthaś ca yathepsitam //
oṃkāraś ca rakāraś ca phaṭkāraś caiva madhyataḥ //
hūṃkāram ādau ante ca hakāraś cādimadhyataḥ //
hūṃkāraś ca rakāraś ca phaṭkāram ādimadhyataḥ //
yas tv idaṃ dhyāyate nityaṃ pūjayen manasā japet //
sa bhuṅkte vipulān bhogān īśānāntapadaṃ labhet //

Appendices :
A: hūṃkārādau svāhānte ākarṣaṇe oṃkārādau vauṣat ante śāntike oṃkārādau su vaṣaḍ ante pauṣtike oṃkārādau vaṣaḍante 'mṛtīkaraṇe phat phat māraṇe oṃ kṣraṃ saṃhārāstra
B: kṣa puruṣa/prakṛti buddhi/ahaṅkāra manaḥ ja śabdasparśarasarūpagandha tanmātraṃ bha pṛthivī āpa teja vāyu ākāśa pañcamahābhūta /ma/śrotratvaccakṣurjihvāghrāṇa buddhīndriya ha/vākpāṇipādapāyūpastha karmendriya
C: jaya brāhmani bhūmi vijaya kṣatrāṇi / āpa ajita / vaisani / teja aparājita sūdrani / vāyu tumburu akāśa śūnya nirguṇa
D: kṣakāraḥ puruṣaḥ sākṣāt makāraḥ prakṛtiḥ smṛtā mahān hakāram ity āhur ahaṃkāras tu ya smṛtaḥ oṃkāras tu manaḥ proktaṃ kathitaṃ devi te kramāt
